'''Bryan''' is an unseen character mentioned in the [[Season 2|second season]]. Bryan was Jaime Lannister's [[squire]] on the day of [[Willem Frey]]'s wedding tournament.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no mention of Jaime ever having a squire named Bryan.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
While imprisoned by [[House Stark]], Ser [[Alton Lannister|Alton]] and [[Jaime Lannister]] talk about [[Willem Frey]]'s wedding. Ser Alton mentioned he filled in as Jaime's squire, when Bryan threw up on his horse. Jaime said it was [[Tyrion Lannister|Tyrion]] who made him so drunk.<ref>"[[A Man Without Honor]]"</ref>
